name: Squishy Stress Cube Fidget Toys Adults - Glow in The Dark Sensory Toys for Kids with Autism Stress Balls for Kids Teens Squeeze Toys for Anxiety Valentines Day Gifts for Kids
short_description: 【Unique Squish Sensation】: Experience the innovative design of our stress cube, featuring an ice-shaped exterior and glow in the dark mochi animal squishies（Whale crab Octopus）. Enjoy a soft feel during slow squeezes and a firmer response with rapid squishing, creating a dynamic sensory experience for stress relief.

【Glow in the Dark Fun】: These captivating stress cubes shine brightly in the dark after exposure to sunlight and artificial light, making them visually appealing and an ideal gift for family and friends who enjoy stress relief toys.

【Safe & Non-Toxic Materials】: Crafted from hypoallergenic, BPA-free, phthalate-free, and latex-free materials, the Stress Cube ensures a safe play experience for users of all ages while being easy to clean with just soap and water.

【Perfect Size for All Hands】: Measuring at 5.5cm (2.17"), the Stress Cube is the ideal size for both children and adults to hold, squeeze, and stretch, providing endless hours of fidgeting fun and promoting relaxation wherever you are.

【Versatile Usage】: The stress cube is an ideal companion for various environments, whether at school, home, or in the office. Use it during stressful moments or as a creative tool to enhance focus, making it a versatile and enjoyable addition to your daily routine.
